discord.homePage: To continue, connect your Discord. This is required to access project chats.

errors.nameSymbols: Allowed characters: letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens

errors.blackList: Avoid overly simple or obvious passwords

errors.requestLength: Enter a description between 10 and 1000 characters.

page404.title: Page not found
page404.description: Oops, you’ve reached a secret page that doesn’t exist! It might have been deleted or moved. Go to our homepage to find what you need.

banner.title: Take your first step into your IT career with
banner.descriptionFirst: Welcome to JunChirp — a platform where every junior developer gains real-world experience, hones skills, and builds a strong portfolio by working on projects and participating in challenges!
banner.descriptionSecond: — to help you become a confident professional through hands-on experience and teamwork. Every task here is a new step in your growth, and every achievement brings you closer to a career in IT.

whatAwaits.title: What's waiting for you?
whatAwaits.itemFirst: Work on real projects you can showcase to employers.
whatAwaits.itemSecond: Develop your soft and hard skills in a friendly community.
whatAwaits.itemThird: Take on challenges that boost your skills and motivation.
whatAwaits.follow: Follow us on LinkedIn so you don’t miss important updates and events!

developers.title: Meet the people behind
developers.firstDevDescription: A strategist, product lead, and the main powerhouse of JunChirp. She launches ideas faster than a laptop can reboot. If the team is doing something — she's already planned it, aligned it, and motivated everyone. Coffee, Google Docs, and faith in juniors are her fuel.
developers.secondDevDescription: The designer who turns chaos into pixel-perfect beauty. If something looks great — that's her work. If it doesn't — it's still in progress. She speaks in colors, fonts, and jokes like "just a little more shadow here."
developers.thirdDevDescription: The ultimate guardian of quality. If the product works — she's already tested it three times. Bugs fear her more than deadlines. Thanks to Liudmyla, the platform stays stable, and the team stays calm (well, almost).
developers.fourthDevDescription: The tester who finds bugs even where they don't exist. Her favorite phrase: "we need to check it again". No bug can slip past her — even if it's disguised as a feature. If something's broken, Anna already knows about it.
developers.fifthDevDescription: The developer who makes the platform tick like clockwork. Equally skilled in backend and frontend, he seems to find solutions faster than anyone can say "bug". Always finds a way to make things just a bit better than before.

support.title: Have a question? We’re here to help!
support.description: Write to us – we’ll find a solution together!

invite.error400: Maximum number of active projects reached (2).

request.error400: Maximum number of active projects reached (2).

homeBanner.title: From beginner to [professional]
homeBanner.subTitle: Your IT career starts here!
text: Register on the platform for IT juniors and get access to real projects to develop your skills.
Train, work on projects and become an expert!
homeBanner.authText: Choose a project, level up your skills, and take your first step in real IT development!

homeQuote.quote: Together we achieve more. Every contribution matters, and the success of the team is the success of everyone.

threeSteps.title: Three simple steps to becoming a confident IT-Pro:

steps.title: Complete your profile.
steps.description: Tell about yourself and your skills — this is your starting point.

steps.title: Join a project.
steps.description: Find a team where your ideas matter. Gain real experience and support!

steps.title: Start your own project.
steps.description: Become a leader — guide your team and bring ideas to life.

whatWeNeed.title: Everything you need for an IT start

noAuth.title: 1. Creative space for inspiration
noAuth.description: All resources for creating creative projects are at your disposal. JunChirp provides everything you need to focus on bringing your ideas to life. Explore the workspace and start creating today!

noAuth.title: 2. Develop your skills in real projects
noAuth.description: Complete tasks, improve your skills, and add new ones to your profile. Solving real problems helps you grow professionally and gain experience that becomes the foundation of your IT career.

noAuth.title: 3. Expand your professional network
noAuth.description: Find like-minded people and conquer new heights together! Build a network of professionals and unlock new opportunities for growth and career development.

auth.title: 1. Want to level up your skills?
auth.description: Choose a project you’re interested in and join in!

auth.title: 2. Have a great idea?
auth.description: Launch your own project and build your dream team!

auth.title: 3. Need more networking?
auth.description: Connect with the community, find like-minded people, and gain valuable insights.

nextLevel.title: The next level is on the horizon!
nextLevel.description: We are preparing new opportunities to make your journey to becoming a professional even more exciting and engaging. [COMING SOON:]

animation.title: [PERSONAL DASHBOARD]
animation.description: All your projects, achievements and challenges — in one place. Track your progress, monitor results, and see how each step brings you closer to your goals!

animation.title: [GROW THROUGH PLAY]
animation.description: Earn XP, collect exclusive badges, and level up by completing tasks. Develop through achievements and improve your skills along the way!

auth.title: Creating something big together with friends is always awesome!
text: Invite your friends, collaborate, generate ideas, and create innovative projects that can change the world!
Working with people you know makes the process even more inspiring. Together we achieve more!

noAuth.title: Now it’s your moment!
text: Reached the end? Now the choice is yours! Time doesn’t wait. It’s your turn now: remain an observer or start conquering new horizons!
Register and make your first step toward your IT career.

invitePlatformPopup.title: Better together
invitePlatformPopup.description: Invite friends and build awesome projects side by side.

auth.googleErrorDetails: Please try again or choose another sign-in method.

home.title: Build the future with us
home.description: Grow your skills by working on real projects with a team. Join us and become part of the change!

emailConfirmation.title: Email confirmation
emailConfirmation.subTitle: Important information:
emailConfirmation.firstRegistrationPart: We've sent an email with a confirmation link to <email>[{userEmail}]</email>. Please check your inbox and click the link to confirm your registration.
emailConfirmation.firstLoginPart: Your email address has not been confirmed yet. To complete your registration, <button>Click here</button> — we will send an email with a confirmation link to <email>[{userEmail}]</email>.
emailConfirmation.secondPart: If you didn’t receive the email, please check your Spam folder or <button>Send the request again</button>.
information: Link validity period: The email confirmation link is valid for 24 hours.

A new link invalidates the previous one: Each time you request a new confirmation link, the previous one becomes invalid. This means the old link will no longer work, and you will need to use the new one.
After 24 hours: If you do not confirm your email address within 24 hours, your data will be deleted from our database, and you will need to start the registration process again.
emailConfirmation.success: Your request has been successfully processed.
emailConfirmation.successDetails: Please check your email for confirmation.
emailConfirmation.error429: You have exceeded the limit for email confirmation requests.
emailConfirmation.error429Details: Please try sending a new request in 1 hour.
emailConfirmation.error400: An error occurred while processing the request.

changeEmailPopup.title: Change email
changeEmailPopup.description: Please enter your new email so we can send you a confirmation email.

deleted.title: Link has expired
deleted.description: The link has expired, and your account has been deleted. To access the platform, please register again.

invalid.title: Link has expired
invalid.description: This link is no longer valid. Please <button>Send the request again</button> to receive a new email confirmation link.
invalid.success: Your request has been successfully processed.
invalid.successDetails: Please check your email for confirmation.
invalid.error429: You have exceeded the limit for email confirmation requests.
invalid.error429Details: Please try sending a new request in 1 hour.
invalid.error400: An error occurred while processing the request.
invalid.error: An error occurred while processing the request.
invalid.errorDetails: The link may have been copied and modified. Email not found.

success.title: Congratulations!
description: You can now sign in to the system.

requestPasswordReset.title: Password reset request
requestPasswordReset.description: To reset your password, enter your email address — if an account with this email exists, we’ll send instructions to restore access.
